titles.title: A resolution appointing managers on the part of the House in the matter of the impeachment of Alcee L. Hastings, judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Florida.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/3/1988--Introduced. Appoints managers on the part of the House of Representatives in the matter of the impeachment of Alcee L. Hastings, Judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Florida.
